entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 2 except zero inland.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except freezing rain inland. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High plus 2 except zero inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain except freezing rain inland this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of thundershowers in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
